attributes.action: Introduction of a flat rate tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The promotion of equality in our society. Rich people still pay more tax and less well off people pay less tax. Current tax system doesn't inspire people to be as succesful as they can be
